name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Thorfinn, Connellingus, morbo)

name: invidious
text: I don't know how I missed it the first time I read this comic, but Showbiz is totally Doug from "Ghost World".

name: tekende
text:
YES.

"I'm hungry enough to chew the crotch out of a rag doll."

name: deimosrising
text: I wonder if it was alright?

name: flynn
text: It was definitely not alright.

name: alejandroadam
text: wrong again. I've been in Habib's possition of power. it is always alright.

name: johnnyc
text: Besides, the way that Biz accents "ALRIGHT" makes me think it wasn't really a question.

name: acefalco
text: having been in Habib's position myself, it was never alright. i'm not cleaning that shit when it explodes, and you're damn sure still paying for it.

name: bhlaab
text: the wrapper might screw up the microwave

name: dusty
text: That is exactly the kind of nonsense a guy like Habib would spout.

name: saint
text: damn man i'd take the slim jim anyday

name: tragicone
text: well, no one ever said you had class

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
damn, man. you just went there!

COMPLETELY.

name: theguitarhero
text: ENTIRELY.

name: greenkoolayd
text: fully

name: puguglypress
text: Without protection

name: pigeon_street
text: Oh man I hope he didn't get AIDS.

name: centipede_damascus
text: I wonder what happens when you microwave a Slim Jim. Anybody a brave enough fool to find out?

name: ssddr
text: I would assume from their high fat content they they would just explode into a volley of greasy shrapnel. The real question is, how long to achive this?

name: zem
text: Does he take the wrapper off, though?

name: orvel
text: 53 seconds.

name: yingkaixing
text: It took you eight months to work up the courage to try this?

name: charchar
text: have you?

name: orvel
text: I had just gotten to this strip after starting from the beginning. I just can't believe that I was the first to try it (or at least report it) after 8 months.

name: grunchorelaxo
text: Oh, man. Would that I couldn't describe so many things as ending with a "volley of greasy shrapnel."

name: jonmw
text:
It's the kind of thing you'd expect to see in Kingdom of Loathing. It would fit in so incredibly well with the general "style" of the whole game. You'd not even realise it was from somewhere else.
However, I can't decide whether it would deal Hot damage (from the microwaveness) or Sleaze damage (from the greasiness). Maybe it could be a single-use combat item that deals both!

name: mannequentin
text: My goodness! Jick and Onstad should collaborate on their respective creations!

name: notcool
text: That is how I usually describe my inevitably untimely demise. Ballistic crator is a term also bandied about.

name: closefriend
text: I'd be worried about the exposed Slim Jim hitting the microwave walls that have not been cleaned a singular time in the microwave's decades of existence .

name: riazm
text: Dude it's impossible for the inside of a microwave to have any sort of bacteria growing. Everything in there is constantly bombarded with microwaves.Relax, microwave a slim jim and when it explodes, go on and lick the microwave door. Trust me, you'll feel better.

name: featurelessvoid
text: That only kills the weak bacteria.  The ones that remain were undead zombie bacteria to begin with, and now they're undead radioactive zombie bacteria.  Undead radioactive zombie bacteria with a score to settle.

name: mastronaut
text: Oh man, I'm firing up MS Word. I think we have a Thing here.

name: heccibiggs
text: Words cannot describe how much I am laughing.

name: woodenteeth
text: A lot? A heap? One more than a bunch?

name: charchar
text: snd you will get laser vision, i promise.

name: riazm
text: I do not like this comment, every time I find it whilst perusing the archives it seems to me the comment of a crass man. The language used appears ersatz and the sentence structuring too pandering. I hope that now, nine months later I am a better man.

name: tragicone
text: No, now you seem uppity. and ain't nothing worse than uppity.

name: zem
text: Also, the contrast here is worth at least a 4 average.

name: i_love_kate
text: I... Didn't feel it. I'm sorry. I should have, I know, but maybe... I'm just unreceptive today.

name: chrisb
text: Microwaved Slim Jim, the perfect meal

name: tim_simmons
text: i don't know about alot of people but i take pride in my low food tastes. i mean having duck all braised up or whatever is tasty but i get just as much enjoyment from eating a microwaved hotdog in a bun covered in mustard and tomato sauce. i am standing tall as a dude of low standards.

name: grunchorelaxo
text: To this day, I still eat slices of whole wheat bread, folded and smeared with barbecue sauce.

name: cbtbone
text: I mean, I enjoy good food as much as the next man.  An expensive meal is a delicious treat if it's at a decent place (some places just overcharge 'cause they know people will pay).  But my general eating habits are a hell of a lot closer to Showbiz than Ray in this strip.  And I'm okay with that.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: yes. i will take that.

name: davidbs
text: Class division in action...

name: rowboat
text: POOR PEOPLE ARE HILARIOUS!!!

name: fattypneumonia
text: Poor people tend to live in clusters.

name: epicurus
text: This is a 5/5 for me. How can Ray and Showbiz both eat food in the same universe?

name: shmuckeles
text: man, showbiz is from circumstances too

name: straw
text: Twin cats got twin Circumstances

name: evolume
text: My french is really bad but, did Ray just order Turbo Manure?

name: andrew_
text:
he ordered a fish(turbot) in a butter sauce(meuniere butter)


* 1/4 c. unsalted butter
* 1 1/2 tsp. fresh lemon juice
* 1 tbsp. finely chopped Italian parsley
* 1/8 tsp. salt

name: josher
text: I'm hungry.

name: gouldgonewild
text: No, andrew, I think evolume brings a valid point to the table

name: tomsonlocal
text: The guy just got two grand and he must have blown it already to be buying just a slim jim. He must really like his audio systems.

name: pa_ass_nts
text: Maybe he just really likes them.

name: zem
text:
pa_ass_nts

oh, i get it

name: stuart
text: passants

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
That puts a whole nother spin on it. A spin which makes Showbiz seem worthy and having excellent priorities. After all, a turbot enjoyed and a slimjim ralphed both turn to shit in 12 hours, but a great audio system enriches the soul.

Therefore, in conclusion, your conclusion must be wrong. Showbiz is of low mind.

name: caseyb3
text:
alt: CALIFORNIA UBER ALLES

I post this only because it is why this strip is a 5 for me.

name: mystkmanat
text: in that case, can you explain it to me?

name: mystkmanat
text: never mind, i simply read below

name: dudesstew
text:
I think the main quesion that needs adressing is why someone would microwave a slim jim in the first place.

This information is vital.

name: semiquaver
text:
Why did you think of that though
Why would you think of that

God, I'm such a whore.

name: checkmatejones
text: Best alt text evar.

name: philosophe
text: I do not understand

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Californee thinks they got one up on the resta thuh 50 Nifty jus 'cos they got Celebrity Governators n' such.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: This, I think, is the very first instance of Ray acting the part of the rich connoisseur.

name: slickshoes3234
text: juxtaposition is awesome

name: luckypyjamas
text: so ray just doesn't even notice beef's absence apparently

name: overman
text: The many Worlds of Ray.

name: lost_buoy
text: So what's in bin 281? Since it's a California-positive strip, I'm gonna guess a big cab with some grippy tannins to cut the bordelaise. Ray's so high-end that I'll bet it's the BV Latour Private Reserve from like '70 or soemthing, just to give mad props to Andre Tchelistcheff. No d'Yquem for dessert?

name: steerpike66
text: I get a tingle of socialist rage over this strip. The gap between rich and poor, eh? Showbiz is a loser but Ray's fortune is mainly luck.

name: jdhenry105
text:
His fortune derives mainly from:

1) Vintage porn
2) Selling soul to Devil in exchange for phat piano skills
3) Inheritance; I've always assumed that Sondra came from money.

So, Ray's wealth derives mostly from venality and stupidity, not luck.

name: mystkmanat
text: Sondra has never heard of any stores besides Neiman Marcus.

name: miaou
text: The Slim Jim sorta resembles a Wii.
